content: That's a common sentiment among viewers. Streaming services offer an ad-free viewing experience, which is a significant advantage over traditional TV networks. Cable TV often forces viewers to watch commercials, which can be repetitive and time-consuming. Streaming services, on the other hand, offer uninterrupted viewing, making it easier to binge-watch a series or enjoy a movie without constant interruptions. This is all made easier by the fact that streaming services allow users to pause, rewind, and fast forward through content as desired. Overall, the availability of ad-free streaming services has created a better overall user experience, which has compounded the growing popularity of these platforms.
